00035 /// struct for holding parameters for a Truncated Lorentzian function
00036 struct TruncatedLorentzianParameters
00037 {
00038     double T;
00039     double tau;
00040     std::complex<double> alpha;
00041     double f0;
00042     
00043     TruncatedLorentzianParameters();
00044     TruncatedLorentzianParameters(const TruncatedLorentzianParameters& that);
00045     TruncatedLorentzianParameters(const std::string& filename);
00046 
00047     /// write out to file 
00048     void write(const std::string& filename) const;
00049 
00050     /// write samples to stream
00051     void writeSamples(std::ostream& os) const;
00052 
00053     /// write samples to stream
00054     void writeSamples(std::ostream& os, 
00055                       double frequencyStart, 
00056                       double frequencyStep, 
00057                       int sampleCount) const;
00058 
00059     /// returns parameters in format usable by TruncatedLorentzian class
00060     ublas::vector<double> parameters(double shift=0, std::complex<double> scale=1) const;
00061 
00062     /// reads in parameters from TruncatedLorentzian format
00063     void parameters(const ublas::vector<double>& value, double shift=0, std::complex<double> scale=1);
00064 };
